meanings.definition: A person who creates or solves crossword puzzles.
meanings.sent1: Cruciverbalists enjoy crafting and unraveling word puzzles.
meanings.sent2: My aunt is a dedicated cruciverbalist who completes the Sunday crossword every week.
meanings.sent3: The cruciverbalists at the tournament were so focused that they didn't notice the time passing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of words, cruciverbalists are the architects of linguistic challenges.
meanings.sent5: The community of cruciverbalists is a vibrant and welcoming group of puzzle enthusiasts.

meanings.definition: Those who have a passion for crossword puzzles.
meanings.sent1: Cruciverbalists eagerly await the release of the latest crossword puzzle.
meanings.sent2: My friends and I are all cruciverbalists who love to solve puzzles together.
meanings.sent3: The group of cruciverbalists at the library formed a crossword club to share their love for puzzles.
meanings.sent4: To some, cruciverbalists are like detectives piecing together the clues of language.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of cruciverbalists to their craft is truly inspiring.
